name: Lunatrix
description:
In Lunarix you have to build a lunar colony and try to fight off the enemy ships. 

This game was made in 48 hours for the   Game Dev London x Into Games - GGJ22.

Credits:
Wizard Dudes

Tutorial:
The game runs in 2 phases.

Combat Phase:
The enemy ships try to destroy your buildings. Click on your guns (orange buildings) and target ships that are in range.

But be careful, there are also allied ships. Use the scanner (cyan buildings) to find out if the ship is attacking you or if it just wants to land. Each allied ship that lands will bring you a new house.

Construction phase:
At the beginning you have to place a house block. Depending on how many allies have landed, you will get bigger blocks (maximum 5).

After that, you can build new scanners and guns. The size (maximum 5) depends on how many houses you have in your supply (see top left).

To start the next Combat Phase click on the "Skip Button".
